Articles.Content: When C7 was posting his development pictures, I imagined that there would be a view from the cockpit. Is it a hidden thing or am I just thinking of stuff?

I think it was (and is) still in development stage - can\'t find it too.

However it is mentioned in the latest release notes.
I\'m fairly sure he meant the cockpit view you see behind the kerbals in the crew cams, they are new. Actual 1st person cockpit flights are coming later, if that\'s what your thinking of.

AFAIK they decided that proper IVA was too hard to do for this release so they delayed it. I haven\'t yet been able to get on 0.16 as the site has been running slow (All you other 30,000 people get off and let me download > ) But I am looking forward too it
